msbt.message: There you are! I've waited so long for my !

I splurged a little bit, but I didn't think you'd mind. Go on, enjoy. It's !
Just brand-new, never-been- used . No big deal.
I've kept this in mint condition, and now it's yours. Enjoy your new !

This has been a favorite of mine, and I hope you like it too. Presenting !
Really?! No way! Like, ?
Did I hear you right?
Ha, ha. Very funny.
Oh, are you sure you want to start a prank war with the great ?
Just any old rhinoceros beetle will do! I'm pretty sure you can find 'em just chilling out on trees.
Just any old stag beetle will do! I'm pretty sure you can find 'em just chilling out on trees.

Just any old bug that hangs out on flowers will do. You can find them on flowers, of course!
Just any old bug that hangs out on tree stumps will do. You can find them on tree stumps, of course!
Oh, any kind of freshwater fish at all would be fine. So, like, any fish from a river or pond.
Oh, any kind of saltwater fish at all would be fine. So, like, any fish from the ocean, .

I'm in desperate need of !I'm sure you can find one down at the beach. The place is positively crawling with 'em.
I'm in desperate need of a fish like !You can find one in fresh water, or more specifically a river.

I'm in desperate need of a fish like !I know they're tricky to find, but try dropping a line in the exact spot where the river meets the ocean.
I'm in desperate need of a fish like !They love the saltwater, so you can find one in the ocean. You know, the BIG water!
